function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 through droplets released from coughs and exhales","Impact":"Severe illnesses and potential death for those infected, global pandemic, economic downturn","Mitigation":"Implementing preventive measures such as mask-wearing, social distancing, and sanitization","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, UV disinfection, contactless technologies","People":"General population, high-risk groups with underlying medical conditions","Owner":"Governments, businesses, individuals"},{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on global economy and major industries","Impact":"Dramatic falls in stock markets, economic shrinkage, worldwide halts to major industries","Mitigation":"Developing relief packages, financial assistance, and stimulus measures, enabling remote work and digitalization","Technologies":"Digital platforms, remote work technologies, e-commerce, financial technology","People":"Businesses, workers, global population","Owner":"Governments, financial institutions, businesses"},{"Description":"Vulnerability of construction industry to economic downturn caused by the pandemic","Impact":"Drastic decline in economic activity, sensitivity to economic cycles, industry vulnerability","Mitigation":"Investing in infrastructure projects, adopting digital construction technologies, diversifying projects","Technologies":"Building Information Modeling (BIM), Internet of Things (IoT) for construction, virtual reality, remote monitoring","People":"Construction industry workers, businesses, investors","Owner":"Construction companies, government agencies, investors"}]}
